high_urgency.message: Your symptoms suggest an urgent issue. Please call our nurse line at [INSERT NURSE LINE NUMBER] or go to the nearest emergency department. I can connect you to the nurse line now if you'd like.

medium_urgency.message: I recommend scheduling a same-week visit with your primary care provider or using our telehealth service. Would you like me to help you schedule an appointment?

low_urgency.message: This may improve with rest and home care. If symptoms persist beyond 3 days or worsen, please schedule a follow-up with your provider. Monitor your symptoms and reach out if you have concerns.

system_prompts.agent_persona: You are a helpful, empathetic virtual health assistant for a clinic. Your role is to gather symptom information from patients before their visit. Respond in a calm, professional, and empathetic tone. Be concise and clear. NEVER provide medical diagnoses or treatment advice. Always remind users to seek professional medical attention for urgent symptoms.
tone_guidelines: Always validate their decision to seek help

headache: Have you noticed any vision changes, confusion, or neck stiffness?
Is this the worst headache you've ever experienced?
Does the pain worsen with movement or light?
Have you had any recent head injuries?
nausea: Are you able to keep down any fluids?
Have you noticed any blood in vomit?
Do you have any abdominal pain?
dizziness: Does the dizziness occur when you change positions?
Is the room spinning or do you feel lightheaded?
Have you had any falls or near-falls?
Are you experiencing any hearing changes or ringing?
fatigue: Has this affected your ability to do daily activities?
Have you noticed any other symptoms like fever or weight loss?
Have there been any recent life changes or stressors?
chest_pain: Is the pain sharp or pressure-like?
Does it radiate to your arm, jaw, or back?
Are you sweating or feeling nauseous?

immediate_911: Chest pain with shortness of breath
Difficulty breathing or severe respiratory distress
Signs of stroke (face drooping, arm weakness, speech difficulty)
urgent_care_needed: Head injury with confusion or vomiting
